Being a superhero makes me happy,...
...and there are women who are amazed by my powers.
However, it can be very hard for me sometimes.
I would make mistakes and feel upset and disappointed,...
...but I need to be brave so my enemies would be scared of me.
After a long day, eating a sandwich makes me feel better.
Then I got really excited when Jimmy invited me to his TV show!
How do you feel about your job?
